snippet: "Pillowcase Rapist" Christopher Hubbart has been conditionally released to live in a desert community outside of Palmdale, California, about 70 miles northeast of downtown Los Angeles....

headline.print_headline: A Look at California Serial Rapist's Release Rules
headline.main: A Look at California Serial Rapist's Release Rules

lead_paragraph: "Pillowcase Rapist" Christopher Hubbart has been conditionally released to live in a desert community outside of Palmdale, California, about 70 miles northeast of downtown Los Angeles.
